name: Hostile Invasion
description:
Hostile invaders have attacked!! Your planet was attempting to find other life in the galaxy, the response they got was an invasion. Aboard your prototype spaceship you are the only thing standing in their way. Can you make it to the end? Are you the hero your planet needs?

Hostile Invasion is a fast-paced asteroid type 2D game. Battle limitless waves of different enemies, gain powerups to expand your arsenal and charge the warp gate to keep up pursuit.

  • Fast-paced
  • Alternate endings
  • Narrative building cutscenes
  • Retro game style
  • Detailed art
  • Only four level
